markdown.content: I wanted to have more content before sharing it, but before the site shuts down I want to let you know that for the past months I've been working alone on a game. It's very very very early in development, but I wanted to show what I got for now (please open the link):

It's a floriography game featuring my character [Saulo](https://cohost.org/NekoRaita/post/7572212-h1-style-padding-0) as the protagonist, where you have to run your flowershop and decipher the costumers needs to build the perfect bouquet. The game is also partially a visual novel in which you get to see the development of Saulo and his "best friend" [Mauro](https://i.imgur.com/6Zllc33.png)'s relationship.
My goal is to make the game alone on my own time and terms and release it for free. I hope one day you randomnly stumble upon my game while browsing some indie releases :(
That being said, I promise I'll put an eggbug on my game!!!!!!!!!!!! ~~(if I don't forget)~~
